organisation_name: The UK Oil and Gas Industry Association Limited (Oil & Gas UK)

goals__remit: Our aim is to strengthen the long-term health of the offshore oil and gas industry in the United Kingdom by working closely with companies across the sector, governments and all other stakeholders to address the issues that affect your business.
